ledgerUserTip: If you would like to import a private key/keystore or connect Ledger, you will first need to [Create Wallet] or [Restore Wallet]
termsAndPrivacy_0: This service is provided by Auro Wallet, please take time to read carefully and understand the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
termsAndPrivacy_1: Please read the <conditions>Terms and Conditions</conditions> and <policy>Privacy Policy</policy> carefully. If you understand fully and agree, please click [Agree] to start using this wallet service.
reset_tip_1: Are you sure you want to reset your wallet?
reset_tip_2: After reseting you existing wallet all the data will be lost. You can only use the mnemonic phrase to restore. Please ensure you have backed-up the mnemonic phrase before you reset the wallet.
confirm_reset_tip: Please enter "delete" to confirm the wallet reset
createPasswordTip: The security password will be used for identity verification purposes to send transactions in Auro Wallet. Auro Wallet won't store the security password itself or retrieve it for you. Please keep your password safe.
backup_checkbox_1: I understand that if the mnemonic phrase is lost, my funds will be lost forever.
backup_checkbox_2: I take full responsibility for protecting the mnemonic phrase.
backup_mne_title: Please write down the following mnemonic phrase and keep it in a safe place.
confirmMneTip: To ensure you have backed up the mnemonic phrase. Please select the 12 words in the correct order.
backup_success: Congrats! You have successfully created a wallet!
backup_success_restore: Congrats! You have successfully restored a wallet!
ledgerSuccessTip: Congrats! You have successfully imported the Ledger wallet.
inputSeed: Please enter the mnemonic phrase in order, with each word separated by a space.
inputVaildSeed: Please enter your valid mnemonic phrase
feeTooHigh: Fees are much higher than average
sendAddressError: Please enter a valid wallet address
amountError: Please enter a valid transaction amount
inputFeeError: Please enter a valid transaction fee
name: Name
addressQrTip: Scan the QR code and transfer MINA to it
ledgerNotSupport: This browser does not currently support Ledger
copyTipContent: Copying the private key can be risky as the clipboard is easily monitored and can be stolen by third-party applications.
confirmEnv: Please ensure your system and the network environment you are using is absolutely safe before performing this operation
privateKeyTip_1: The private key consists of a string of characters, owning the private key is equivalent to owning the asset.
privateKeyTip_2: Once the private key is lost it cannot be retrieved. Please make sure to backup the private key and keep it in a safe place.
deleteAccountTip: A deleted account can only be restored by the Mnemonic Phrase or from a Private Key. Please make sure you have backed up your Mnemonic Phrase and Private Key.
backTips_2: The mnemonic phrase consists of 12 English words, these words cannot be retrieved if they are lost. Make sure the mnemonic phrase is kept in a secure location.
backTips_3: If the wallet cannot be accessed because the device is lost or for any other reason, importing the mnemonic phrase is the only way to retrieve your assets.
importSameAccount_1: The address of the account to be created is:
importSameAccount_2: An existing imported account [{{accountName}}] is a duplicate of this address. Auro Wallet does not support the creation of duplicate account addresses. Please go to the Account Management to delete the imported account.
pleaseInputPriKey: Please enter the mnemonic phrase in order, with each word separated by a space.
importAccount_2: The imported accounts will not be associated with your originally created Auro wallet.
importAccount_3: The imported accounts will be marked with [Imported] in the account list.
pleaseInputKeyPair: Please enter the contents of the Keystore file.
keystoreError: Keystore contents or password is incorrect
ledgerImportTip: Please click the [Import] button and confirm on your Ledger wallet
back2extension: Please continue the operation in the wallet app,
pleaseConnectLedger: Please connect your Ledger to the computer
pleaseOpenInLedger: Open the Mina App on your Ledger device
walletAbout: Auro Wallet is a Mina wallet developed by the community. It is simple, convenient, and fully open source. It currently supports all the functions of the Mina mainnet.
addNetworkTip: Only add nodes that you trust. Using unknown nodes can be a security risk.
revealMneTip: Please write down the following mnemonic phrase and keep it in a safe place.
mneReminder: Do not share your mnemonic phrase!
mneReminderContent: If someone has your mnemonic phrase, they will have full control of your wallet, Do not share it.
approveTip: This website would like to view account
approveWaring: For security only connect to trusted sites
watchModeDeleteTip: Auro wallet no longer supports the [Watch Account] , you will need to <red>delete all watch accounts</red> before you can continue to use Auro Wallet.
walletConnected: Auro Wallet has connected to this website.
noAccountConnect: Auro Wallet has not connected to this website. In order to connect to this website, please find the connect button on the website.
notActiveAccountTip: The Mina network charges a one-time account creation fee of 1 MINA for spam prevention. It will be automatically deducted from the first transaction received, it is not charged by the wallet.
emptyDelegateDesc: Delegating MINA to a block producer node can help you to obtain rewards for producing blocks. The Block Producer will distribute rewards according to the amount of your delegated proportion, and your percentage of rewards will also depend on the commission rate set by the Block Producer. Here is some information regarding the effective time of delegating and rewards distributing rules: <click>Staking Guide</click>
notificationContent: The transfer has been confirmed, click to view the transaction.
ledgerConnectSuccess: Your Ledger wallet has been successfully connected.
waitingLedgerConfirmTip: Please confirm in the Ledger hardware wallet, the signature may take 1-3 minutes.
waitingLedgerConfirmTip_2: Do not close this window until confirmed.
popOutWindow: Pop out to a new window
